person.name: Shruti Dubey
person.title: Full-Stack Developer
person.summary: Postgraduate in Computer Science with experience in full‑stack development using Flutter, Node.js, and AWS. Leading the build of a health supplement platform across frontend and backend. Interested in applying tech to healthcare through machine learning, API integrations, and cloud‑based systems.

impacts: Led the end‑to‑end development of a health supplement platform, owning architecture, development, and deployment.
Built a mobile‑first frontend in Flutter focused on user education and product discovery.
Designed and deployed Django REST APIs, integrated third‑party services (checkout, CRM, chatbot), and implemented cloud‑based features for scalability.
Developed responsive web pages using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript, improving performance and achieving ~30% faster load times across devices.
Built backend services with Node.js and Express for dynamic data rendering; integrated custom WordPress plugins and React components to streamline content management.
Collaborated in an agile team to deliver accessible, brand‑aligned UIs, contributing to a ~20% increase in user satisfaction based on client feedback and analytics.

projects.title: News Headlines and Covid Vaccine Data Analysis (Dissertation)
projects.problem: Understand vaccine‑related media sentiment and its relationship to vaccination trends across the UK.
projects.approach: Scraped >433k headlines from 3 UK news sites (BeautifulSoup); performed sentiment analysis with VADER; engineered vaccination and sentiment datasets; applied NLP preprocessing with NLTK & Pandas; built an interactive dashboard in Dash/Plotly.
projects.impact: Revealed correlations between vaccination rates and sentiment trends over time and regions; enabled data‑driven exploration via a visualization dashboard.

projects.title: Recommending Project Resources (Final Year Project)
projects.problem: Students struggled to find relevant project resources across domains.
projects.approach: Collected ~3,600 project entries via web scraping (Octoparse, GitHub, Medium); engineered the dataset; built a content‑based recommender with CountVectorizer and Cosine Similarity; applied NLP preprocessing (tokenization, stemming, stopword removal) in NLTK; served real‑time recommendations via a web interface.
projects.impact: Improved discoverability of project resources and delivered real‑time recommendations; work published in IJRASET.

education.degree: MSc in Advanced Computer Science (Masters with Merit)
